## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] Self-review of code completed
- [ ] Code is well-commented, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] No console.log or debug statements left in code
- [ ] No commented-out code blocks

### Documentation
- [ ] Documentation updated (if applicable)
- [ ] README updated (if applicable)
- [ ] API documentation updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Inline code comments added where necessary

### Testing
- [ ] Tests added for new functionality
- [ ] All tests pass locally
- [ ] Test coverage maintained or improved
- [ ] Edge cases considered and tested

### Accessibility
- [ ] Changes are accessible (WCAG 2.1 AA compliant)
- [ ] Keyboard navigation works
- [ ] Screen reader compatibility verified
- [ ] Color contrast meets requirements

### Browser/Device Compatibility
- [ ] Tested on Chrome
- [ ] Tested on Firefox
- [ ] Tested on Safari (if applicable)
- [ ] Mobile responsiveness verified
- [ ] Cross-browser compatibility confirmed

### Community Guidelines
- [ ] Changes align with project vision and values
- [ ] Contribution guidelines followed
- [ ] Code of conduct respected
- [ ] Community feedback incorporated (if applicable)

---

## For Reviewers

### Review Checklist
- [ ] Code quality and style
- [ ] Functionality works as described
- [ ] Tests are comprehensive
- [ ] Documentation is clear and complete
- [ ] No security vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] Performance impact is acceptable
- [ ] Changes align with project goals

### Feedback Guidelines
- Be constructive and specific in feedback
- Suggest improvements rather than just pointing out problems
- Consider the contributor's experience level
- Acknowledge good work and improvements
- Focus on the code, not the person

Thank you for contributing to OpenLaunch! üéâ
